page.title: 07A RURAL CONSTABLE IN APEDALE
page.content: At 11-50am I am directed to a 999 call traced to a house 10 miles away, the operator had only heard a gurgling noise! I arrive,expecting to find a heart attack victim,but find that a 2 year old child had made the call! After lunch I patrol the village, providing a reassuring presence to the Public,and chatting to the locals A relatively quiet afternoon means that Iam able to return home at 5pm. I relax at home,but just at bedtime I am called by Headquarters asking me to attend a Burglar Alarm.It is a false alarm and I am able to return to bed still keeping an ear open for the phone in case my day is not yet finished.
